sense.def:
Nekaj se zgodi
until a particular time
, kadar se zgodi pred določenim časom ali ustavi ob določenem času.

seg.quote: We went on duty at six in the evening and worked until 2 a.m.
You can get free prescriptions until you are 16.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj ne zgodi
until a particular time
, se ne zgodi do določenega časa, ampak pozneje.

seg.quote: They didn't find her until the next day.
Women did not gain the vote until after the First World War.
